title: With Morde in the Works
body:
Can We make him a Late Game Power House again.  
He  used to be  THEE late game champ  before Riot Reworked him.

I really miss that aspect about him.
Maybe have him break the level cap or something.

replies.body: I mean, didn't that get hinted at?  I remember a line in the vein of sending souls back someplace and that felt like a form of stacking mechanic similar to Nasus.  It doesn't tell us anything solid but that was the vibe I got from the post.
I am pretty sure he will be fun to play, every rework greatly improved the overall playstyle. We didnt really have any rework stinkers in a long time.

The last big one was {{champion:82}}  sadly enough.

That track record doesn't fill me with optimism. 

I would just like to bring him back to being a Great late game champ instead of this 
 weak early
 weak late
 situationally good midgame. 

That we have now
